message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I appreciate you being flexible.  I'm really interested in the product, but $110 is a bit higher than I'm willing to go right now.  Would you consider $105?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think $108 is the lowest I can go. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
